job_title: Senior Software Developer/Architect in Brighton, England
pros:
Being an occupational health company, they understand the health and well-being of staff makes a big difference to their productivity.
What you do here makes a real difference.
Stong ethical employer.
Your first week of joining is full of LMS study that includes values and culture, this is called 'Essential Learning' many other companies are oblivious to what Health Partners take for granted. 
This is more than a job its Mission.
cons: none that i can think of

job_title: Occupational Health Technician in Birmingham, England
pros: Solid management - helps however they can
cons: Low pay - no opportunities for bonus. Restricted progression

pros: Opportunity to work from home, great team, supportive management, good pay
cons: Intense workload, need to work on training of new staff
